data.name: Among Stars
data.detailed_description:
In future an advanced civilization come to Earth making it their colony, humans fought for their freedom on earth and in space.

Human kind had station in space wich help them to fight with aliens, most of their army is made by robot who are designed to find and destroy all humans that dont obey them.

Future updates:
Single player
Base build, will be able to build on planets and in space
Fights in space with space ships
Fights inside stations and inside ships
Fights in planet
Crafting system
Skill system

In future an advanced civilization come to Earth making it their colony, humans fought for their freedom on earth and in space.

Human kind had station in space wich help them to fight with aliens, most of their army is made by robot who are designed to find and destroy all humans that dont obey them.

data.short_description: Among Stars is about the survival of the human species. Fighting will take place in space on stations, ships and on planets. Spaceships with advanced technology can give you the upper hand to survive and defeat the alien invaders. Play solo or have multiple players unite to withstand the invasion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
